description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and the conclusion of the season's playoffs. The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series. 

This season, the finals are played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

markets.description:
The NBA Finals is the annual championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA). The Eastern and Western conference champions play a best-of-seven game series to determine which team will be the 2022 NBA champion. The team that wins the series is awarded the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy.

Game 1 of the Finals will be on June 2, 2022. If deemed necessary, Game 7 is scheduled for June 19.

This market will resolve to "East" if the winning team belongs to the Eastern Conference, or to "West" if the winning team belongs to the Western Conference.

If, for any reason, the winner of 2022 NBA Finals is not known by June 30 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve 50-50.
markets.question: 2022 NBA Finals: East or West?

markets.description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and conclusion of the season's playoffs. The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series. This season the finals are to be played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

This is a market on who will win Game 1 of the 2022 NBA Finals, a matchup scheduled for June 2, 2022 (9 PM ET).

This market will resolve to “Celtics” if the Boston Celtics win Game 1, and “Warriors” if the Golden State Warriors win. 

If for any reason the winner of this game is not decided by June 30, 2022 (ET), this market will resolve 50-50.
markets.question: 2022 NBA Finals: Who will win Celtics vs. Warriors Game 1?

markets.description:
The Bill Russell NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award is an annual National Basketball Association (NBA) award given since the 1969 NBA Finals. The award is decided by a panel of eleven media members, who cast votes after the conclusion of the Finals. The person with the highest number of votes wins the award. The 2022 NBA Finals are played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors) wins the 2022 NBA Finals MVP Award and to "No" otherwise.

If the award is not decided by July 15, 2022 (11 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

Please note that the Bill Russell NBA Finals MVP Award is a different award than the National Basketball Association Most Valuable Player Award (Maurice Podoloff Trophy) which is presented to the best performing player of the regular season.
markets.question: Will Stephen Curry win the 2022 NBA Finals MVP?

markets.description:
The Bill Russell NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award is an annual National Basketball Association (NBA) award given since the 1969 NBA Finals. The award is decided by a panel of eleven media members, who cast votes after the conclusion of the Finals. The person with the highest number of votes wins the award. The 2022 NBA Finals are played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Jayson Tatum (Boston Celtics) wins the 2022 NBA Finals MVP Award and to "No" otherwise.

If the award is not decided by July 15, 2022 (11 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

Please note that the Bill Russell NBA Finals MVP Award is a different award than the National Basketball Association Most Valuable Player Award (Maurice Podoloff Trophy) which is presented to the best performing player of the regular season.
markets.question: Will Jayson Tatum win the 2022 NBA Finals MVP?

markets.description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and the conclusion of the season's playoffs. 

The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series, in which one team must win four games (majority of the seven) to win the series. It is not necessary for the four games to be won consecutively. Draws are not permitted, play continues until there is a winner, which could happen on Game 4, Game 5, Game 6 or Game 7 of the series.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the 2022 NBA Finals champion is decided on Game 6, meaning one of the teams wins for the fourth time in Game 6 becoming the champion. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No".

This season the finals are to be played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors. The potential Game 6 of the 2022 NBA Finals is scheduled for June 16, 2022 (9 pm ET). If for any reason the series does not end by July 30, this market will resolve to "No".
markets.groupItemTitle: Will the series end on Game 6?
markets.question: 2022 NBA Finals: Will the series end on Game 6?

markets.description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and the conclusion of the season's playoffs.  The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series, wherein one team must win four games (majority of the seven) to win the series. 

This season the finals are to be played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the total point spread of the series is greater than 10.5, or to "No" if it is less than 10.5.

For the purposes of this market, the total point spread is defined as the absolute difference between the total sum of points scored by each team, after the series is completed.

For example if at the end of the series the Boston Celtics scored 640 points in total and the Golden State Warriors scored 651 points in total, the total point spread would be 11, hence the market would resolve to "Yes."

If for any reason the series does not end by July 30, 2022 (ET) this market will resolve 50/50.
markets.question: 2022 NBA Finals: Total point spread more than 10.5?

markets.description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and the conclusion of the season's playoffs. The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series. 

This is a market whether Steph Curry scores more than 28.5 points in Game 2 of the 2022 NBA Finals, a matchup between the Boston Celtics and the Golden State Warriors, scheduled for June 5, 2022 (8 PM ET).

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Steph Curry scores more than 28.5 points in the aforementioned Game 2 and to “No”, otherwise.

If for any reason the score is not decided by June 30, 2022 (ET), this market will resolve to "No".
markets.question: 2022 NBA Finals: Will Steph Curry score over 28.5 points in Game 2?

markets.description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and conclusion of the season's playoffs. The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series. This season the finals are to be played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

This is a market on who will win score more points in Game 3 of the 2022 NBA Finals, a matchup scheduled for June 8, 2022 (9 PM ET), Steph Curry (Golden State Warriors) or Jayson Tatum (Boston Celtics).

This market will resolve to “Curry” if Steph Curry scores more points, or to "Tatum" if Jayson Tatum scores more points.
If Curry and Tatum score an equal number of points in Game 3, this market will resolve 50-50.

If for any reason the game is not decided by June 30, 2022 (ET), this market will resolve 50-50.
markets.groupItemTitle: Game 3: Who will score more points, Curry or Tatum?
markets.question: 2022 NBA Finals: Who will score more points in Game 3, Steph Curry or Jayson Tatum?
